verses.verse: And after <WG3326> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> Jesus <WG2424> was walking <WG4043> in Galilee; <WG1056> for He was unwilling <WG3756> <WG2309> to walk <WG4043> in Judea, <WG2453> because <WG3754> the Jews <WG2453> were seeking <WG2212> to kill <WG615> Him.
Now <WG1161> the feast <WG1859> of the Jews, <WG2453> the Feast <WG4634> of Booths, <WG4634> was at hand. <WG1451>

His brothers <WG80> therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> to Him, "Depart <WG3327> from here, <WG1782> and go <WG5217> into Judea, <WG2453> that Your disciples <WG3101> also <WG2532> may behold <WG2334> Your works <WG2041> which <WG3739> You are doing. <WG4160>

"For no <WG3762> one <WG3762> does <WG4160> anything <WG5100> in secret, <WG2927> when <WG2532> he himself <WG846> seeks <WG2212> to be [known] publicly. <WG3954> If <WG1487> You do <WG4160> these <WG3778> things, <WG3778> show <WG5319> Yourself <WG4572> to the world. <WG2889>"
For not even <WG3761> His brothers <WG80> were believing <WG4100> in Him.
Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> to them, "My time <WG2540> is not yet <WG3768> at hand, <WG3918> but your time <WG2540> is always <WG3842> opportune. <WG2092>
"The world <WG2889> cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> hate <WG3404> you; but it hates <WG3404> Me because <WG3754> I testify <WG3140> of it, that its deeds <WG2041> are evil. <WG4190>
"Go <WG305> up to the feast <WG1859> yourselves; <WG4771> I do not go <WG305> up to this <WG3778> feast <WG1859> because <WG3754> My time <WG2540> has not yet <WG3768> fully <WG4137> come. <WG4137>"
And having said <WG3004> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> to them, He stayed <WG3306> in Galilee. <WG1056>

But when <WG5613> His brothers <WG80> had gone <WG305> up to the feast, <WG1859> then <WG5119> He Himself <WG846> also <WG2532> went <WG305> up, not publicly, <WG5320> but as it were, in secret. <WG2927>
The Jews <WG2453> therefore <WG3767> were seeking <WG2212> Him at the feast, <WG1859> and were saying, <WG3004> "Where <WG4226> is He?"

And there was much <WG4183> grumbling <WG1112> among <WG1722> the multitudes <WG3793> concerning <WG4012> Him; some <WG3588> <WG3303> were saying, <WG3004> "He is a good <WG18> man <WG18>"; others <WG243> were saying, <WG3004> "No, <WG3756> on the contrary, <WG235> He leads <WG4105> the multitude <WG3793> astray. <WG4105>"
Yet <WG3305> no <WG3762> one <WG3762> was speaking <WG2980> openly <WG3954> of Him for fear <WG5401> of the Jews. <WG2453>
But when it was now <WG2235> the midst <WG3322> of the feast <WG1859> Jesus <WG2424> went <WG305> up into the temple, <WG2413> and [began to] teach. <WG1321>

The Jews <WG2453> therefore <WG3767> were marveling, <WG2296> saying, <WG3004> "How <WG4459> has this <WG3778> man <WG3778> become <WG3609> learned, <WG3609> having never <WG3361> been educated <WG3129>?"
Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> answered <WG611> them, and said, <WG3004> "My teaching <WG1322> is not Mine, <WG1699> but His who sent <WG3992> Me.

"If <WG1437> any <WG5100> man <WG5100> is willing <WG2309> to do <WG4160> His will, <WG2307> he shall know <WG1097> of the teaching, <WG1322> whether <WG4220> it is of God, <WG2316> or <WG2228> [whether] I speak <WG2980> from Myself. <WG1683>

"He who speaks <WG2980> from himself <WG1438> seeks <WG2212> his own <WG2398> glory; <WG1391> but He who is seeking <WG2212> the glory <WG1391> of the One who sent <WG3992> Him, He is true, <WG227> and there is no <WG3756> unrighteousness <WG93> in Him.
" Did not Moses <WG3475> give <WG1325> you the Law, <WG3551> and [yet] none <WG3762> of you carries <WG4160> out the Law <WG3551>? Why <WG5101> do you seek <WG2212> to kill <WG615> Me?"
The multitude <WG3793> answered, <WG611> "You have <WG2192> a demon! <WG1140> Who <WG5101> seeks <WG2212> to kill <WG615> You?"
Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to them, "I did <WG4160> one <WG1520> deed, <WG2041> and you all <WG3956> marvel. <WG2296>

"On this <WG3778> account <WG1223> Moses <WG3475> has given <WG1325> you circumcision <WG4061> (not because <WG3754> it is from Moses, <WG3475> but from the fathers <WG3962>), and on [the] Sabbath <WG4521> you circumcise <WG4059> a man. <WG444>

"If <WG1487> a man <WG444> receives <WG2983> circumcision <WG4061> on [the] Sabbath <WG4521> that the Law <WG3551> of Moses <WG3475> may not be broken, <WG3089> are you angry <WG5520> with Me because <WG3754> I made <WG4160> an entire <WG3650> man <WG444> well <WG5199> on [the] Sabbath <WG4521>?
"Do not judge <WG2919> according <WG2596> to appearance, <WG3799> but judge <WG2919> with righteous <WG1342> judgment. <WG2920>"
Therefore <WG3767> some <WG5100> of the people <WG2415> of Jerusalem <WG2415> were saying, <WG3004> "Is this <WG3778> not the man whom <WG3739> they are seeking <WG2212> to kill <WG615>?

"And look, <WG2396> He is speaking <WG2980> publicly, <WG3954> and they are saying <WG3004> nothing <WG3762> to Him. The rulers <WG758> do not really <WG230> know <WG1097> that this <WG3778> is the Christ, <WG5547> do they?

"However, <WG235> we know <WG3609> where <WG4159> this <WG3778> man <WG3778> is from; but whenever <WG3752> the Christ <WG5547> may come, <WG2064> no <WG3762> one <WG3762> knows <WG1097> where <WG4159> He is from."

Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> cried <WG2896> out in the temple, <WG2413> teaching <WG1321> and saying, <WG3004> "You both <WG2532> know <WG3609> Me and know <WG3609> where <WG4159> I am <WG1510> from; and I have not come <WG2064> of Myself, <WG1683> but He who sent <WG3992> Me is true, <WG228> whom <WG3739> you do not know. <WG3609>
"I know <WG3609> Him; because <WG3754> I am <WG1510> from Him, and He sent <WG649> Me."

They were seeking <WG2212> therefore <WG3767> to seize <WG4084> Him; and no <WG3762> man <WG3762> laid <WG1911> his hand <WG5495> on Him, because <WG3754> His hour <WG5610> had not yet <WG3768> come. <WG2064>

But many <WG4183> of the multitude <WG3793> believed <WG4100> in Him; and they were saying, <WG3004> "When <WG3752> the Christ <WG5547> shall come, <WG2064> He will not perform <WG2038> more <WG4183> signs <WG4592> than those which <WG3739> this <WG3778> man <WG3778> has, will He?"

The Pharisees <WG5330> heard <WG191> the multitude <WG3793> muttering <WG1111> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> about <WG4012> Him; and the chief <WG749> priests <WG749> and the Pharisees <WG5330> sent <WG649> officers <WG5257> to seize <WG4084> Him.
Jesus <WG2424> therefore <WG3767> said, <WG3004> "For a little <WG3398> while <WG5550> longer <WG2089> I am <WG1510> with you, then <WG2532> I go <WG5217> to Him who sent <WG3992> Me.
"You shall seek <WG2212> Me, and shall not find <WG2147> Me; and where <WG3699> I am, <WG1510> you cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> come. <WG2064>"

The Jews <WG2453> therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> to one <WG1438> another, <WG1438> "Where <WG4226> does this <WG3778> man <WG3778> intend <WG3195> to go <WG4198> that we shall not find <WG2147> Him? He is not intending <WG3195> to go <WG4198> to the Dispersion <WG1290> among the Greeks, <WG1672> and teach <WG1321> the Greeks, <WG1672> is He?

"What <WG5101> is this <WG3778> statement <WG3056> that He said, <WG3004> 'You will seek <WG2212> Me, and will not find <WG2147> Me; and where <WG3699> I am, <WG1510> you cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> come <WG2064>'?"

Now <WG1161> on the last <WG2078> day, <WG2250> the great <WG3173> [day] of the feast, <WG1859> Jesus <WG2424> stood <WG2476> and cried <WG2896> out, saying, <WG3004> "If <WG1437> any <WG5100> man <WG5100> is thirsty, <WG1372> let him come <WG2064> to Me and drink. <WG4095>
"He who believes <WG4100> in Me, as the Scripture <WG1124> said, <WG3004> 'From his innermost <WG2836> being <WG2836> shall flow <WG4482> rivers <WG4215> of living <WG2198> water. <WG5204>'"

But this <WG3778> He spoke <WG3004> of the Spirit, <WG4151> whom <WG3739> those <WG3588> who believed <WG4100> in Him were to receive; <WG2983> for the Spirit <WG4151> was not yet <WG3768> [given,] because <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> was not yet <WG3764> glorified. <WG1392>
[Some] of the multitude <WG3793> therefore, <WG3767> when they heard <WG191> these <WG3778> words, <WG3056> were saying, <WG3004> "This <WG3778> certainly <WG230> is the Prophet. <WG4396>"

Others <WG243> were saying, <WG3004> "This <WG3778> is the Christ. <WG5547>" Still others <WG3588> were saying, <WG3004> "Surely <WG3361> the Christ <WG5547> is not going to come <WG2064> from Galilee, <WG1056> is He?

"Has not the Scripture <WG1124> said <WG3004> that the Christ <WG5547> comes <WG2064> from the offspring <WG4690> of David, <WG7035> and from Bethlehem, <WG965> the village <WG2968> where <WG3699> David <WG7035> was?"
So <WG3767> there arose <WG1096> a division <WG4978> in the multitude <WG3793> because <WG1223> of Him.
And some <WG5100> of them wanted <WG2309> to seize <WG4084> Him, but no <WG3762> one <WG3762> laid <WG1911> hands <WG5495> on Him.

The officers <WG5257> therefore <WG3767> came <WG2064> to the chief <WG749> priests <WG749> and Pharisees, <WG5330> and they said <WG3004> to them, "Why <WG1223> <WG5101> did you not bring <WG71> Him?"
The officers <WG5257> answered, <WG611> "Never <WG3763> did a man <WG444> speak <WG2980> the way <WG3779> this <WG3779> man <WG444> speaks. <WG2980>"
The Pharisees <WG5330> therefore <WG3767> answered <WG611> them, "You have not also <WG2532> been led <WG4105> astray, <WG4105> have you?
"No <WG3361> one <WG5100> of the rulers <WG758> or <WG2228> Pharisees <WG5330> has believed <WG4100> in Him, has he?
"But this <WG3778> multitude <WG3793> which does not know <WG1097> the Law <WG3551> is accursed. <WG7074>"
Nicodemus <WG3530> said <WG3004> to them (he who came <WG2064> to Him before, <WG4387> being <WG1510> one <WG1520> of them),
"Our Law <WG3551> does not judge <WG2919> a man, <WG444> unless <WG1437> <WG3361> it first <WG4413> hears <WG191> from him and knows <WG1097> what <WG5101> he is doing, <WG4160> does it?"

They answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to him, "You are not also <WG2532> from Galilee, <WG1056> are you? Search, <WG2045> and see <WG3708> that no <WG3756> prophet <WG4396> arises <WG1453> out of Galilee. <WG1056>"
[And everyone <WG1538> went <WG4198> to his home. <WG3624>
